name: lightweight-music-server
description: LMS is a lightweight and fast self-hosted music streaming server with Last.fm scrobbling, playlist support, and web-based playback. It allows fully-private music streaming from your own server to any device.

features.title: Lightweight
features.description: Web-based playback, Fast performance, Low resource usage. Lightweight music server

features.title: Last.fm Integration
features.description: Scrobbling support, Music discovery, Listening history. Track what you listen to

features.title: Playlist Management
features.description: Create playlists, Smart playlists, Queue management. Organize your music listening

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: User accounts, Personal libraries, Access control. Share music with family
